DOC.detailed_description: During study , patient receive mometasone ( powder , 220 mcg once-daily , approximately 6 week ) . In crossover manner , eligible patient also receive montelukast ( powder , 1 mg once-daily , approximately 2 week ) follow placebo ; receive placebo follow montelukast . The order 2 treatment add mometasone randomize .
